snippet: The death of a technology wizard puts the issue of access to information in the limelight; "Argo'' was a surprise winner Sunday night at the Golden Globe awards; and Conde Nast seeks more control over the rights to articles.
abstract: The death of a technology wizard puts the issue of access to information in the limelight; "Argo'' was a surprise winner Sunday night at the Golden Globe awards; and Conde Nast seeks more control over the rights to articles.

headline.main: The Breakfast Meeting: A Golden Globes Surprise and a Tough Stance From Conde Nast
